entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML Hot Reload fails with TypeConverter for RowDefinitionCollection error #10679
  • Preferences.Get() gives different results on Windows Machine simulator vs Android simulator ... #10676
  • MAUI App Windows App - Mouse movement reversed #10675
  • Maui iOS failing to load local resources in using WebView Source #10674
  • IconImageSource not using FontFamily for correct image #10673
  • Maui jumps with the shell, and the Android input soft keyboard does not automatically close #10671
  • MessagingCenter is not thread safe #10670
  • .NET MAUI Icon and Splash screen Looks Bad #10669
  • Basic Frame Test no longer passes on WinUI #10668
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Localize Workload descriptions #10667
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • System.UnathorizedException: denied access to resizer/r/drawable elements #10666
  • When using a barcode scanner, the Entry.Completed event is fired with empty Text #10663
    Backlog
  • WindowSoftInputModeAdjust.Resize and Pan on iOS #10662
    Backlog
  • [Bug] [Android] Inconsistent toolbar text color on interaction. #10660
    Backlog
  • [Bug] [MacCatalyst] [iOS] Content page ToolBarItem icon image not displaying properly #10659
    Backlog

Closed

  • Add IsTrimmable=False attribute to non-trimmable assemblies #9816
    7.0
  • [WinUI] Flashy backgrounds on start #10629
  • Hover gesture recognizer #9141
    7.0
  • [MacCatalyst] PointerOver visual state freezes up #10227
    Backlog
  • Attached Property Errors #10652
  • Entry Control: When IsPassword is enabled and FontSize isn't specified , the text font doesn't affect placeholder font #10620
  • [Android] Stacklayout child get cropped inside scroll view #10658
    Backlog
  • Lottie animation not visible on Page from ServiceProvider #10628
  • Android PopModalAsync still fails when popping a NavigationPage after latest review update (.NET 7) #10656
  • Shell navigation PopToRoot does not work on Windows if stack size > 2 #10524
    Backlog
  • [Android] ConfigureLifecycleEvents OnBackPressed sample from documentation does not compile #10555
  • Frame.Opacity has no Effect #10220
    Backlog
  • [Android] OnNavigatedTo is called with PreviousPage when application is waked up from background #10485
  • [Android] Images aren't reloading correctly in CollectionView #10435

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix WinAppSDK 12 Additional resources keys #10680
  • Update to WinAppSDK 1.2 #10678
  • [iOS] Set data context on MauiDoneAccessoryView. #10677
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Frame opacity #10672
    community ✨
  • Revert "[Windows] Fix default corner radius on Button" #10664

Merged

  • Make IsTrimmable=False in all assemblies that have no value #10647
  • Fix PGR issue on Catalyst #10665
    platform/macOS 🍏
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
    area/gestures
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22511.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22513.1 #10661
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix how PopToRoot propagates to handler #10653
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭
  • Always disconnect when handler changes #10655

Updated

  • [Android] Ensure SearchView meets min size requirements #10510
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling (Shadows) #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Core] Changes disposing items in CollectionView #10590
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10636
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Housekeeping] Complete pending TODOs in Core #10015
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow to reset an Image setting the Source to null #10371
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-image
